attributes.label: default-bar-color
attributes.description: Default color to draw the bars. Default value is `#47DB99`.

attributes.label: description
attributes.description: Description text of the widget

attributes.label: disable-interactivity
attributes.description: Disable category selection in Widget

attributes.label: error
attributes.description: Text shown in the header subtitle when there's an error

attributes.label: error-description
attributes.description: Extended error description, only shown when error is present

attributes.label: heading
attributes.description: Heading text of the widget

attributes.label: is-loading
attributes.description: Boolean property to control the widget loading state. If true, a spinner is shown.

attributes.label: no-data-body-message
attributes.description: Message shown in body when no data is available

attributes.label: no-data-header-message
attributes.description: Message shown in header when no data is available

attributes.label: show-clear-button
attributes.description: If truthy, it'll show a button to clear selected categories when there are any. Default value is `false`.

attributes.label: show-header
attributes.description: If truthy, it'll render the heading and component's description. Default value is `true`.

attributes.label: use-total-percentage
attributes.description:
If truthy, we'll use the sum of all categories' value to render the bar percentage.
By default, we use the maximum category value to render the bar percentage.

attributes.label: visible-categories
attributes.description: The number of visible categories without aggregation.

attributes.label: default-text
attributes.description: Default text to show when no option is selected

attributes.label: selected-option
attributes.description: Selected option to show in the dropdown

attributes.label: show-clear-button
attributes.description: Allow the user to clear selected option

attributes.label: clear-text
attributes.description: Text rendered inside the clear selection button

attributes.label: color
attributes.description: Override color for the histogram bars

attributes.label: description
attributes.description: Description of the widget to be displayed

attributes.label: disable-animation
attributes.description: This lets you disable the animations for the bars when showing / updating the data

attributes.label: disable-interactivity
attributes.description: Disables selection brushes and events for the widget

attributes.label: error
attributes.description:
Use this widget to put the widget in "error mode".
When error mode is active. The header will display the given text.
And the body will be display the errorDescription instead any data.

attributes.label: error-description
attributes.description: Extended error description, only shown when error is present

attributes.label: heading
attributes.description: Title of the widget to be displayed

attributes.label: is-loading
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to put the widget in "loading mode".
When loading mode is active, a spinner will be shown and the data will be hidden.

attributes.label: no-data-body-message
attributes.description: Message shown in body when no data is available

attributes.label: no-data-header-message
attributes.description: Message shown in header when no data is available

attributes.label: responsive
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to decide if the widget should be rerendered on window resize.
Defaults to true.

attributes.label: show-clear
attributes.description: Display a clear button that clears the histogram selection.

attributes.label: show-header
attributes.description: Toggles displaying title and description

attributes.label: unselected-color
attributes.description: Override color for the non selected histogram bars

attributes.label: x-label
attributes.description: Label the x axis of the histogram with the given string.

attributes.label: y-label
attributes.description: Label the y axis of the histogram with the given string.

attributes.label: disabled
attributes.description: Disables component if truthy

attributes.label: draggable
attributes.description: If this property is set to true, and it has multiple value, you can drag the entire track.

attributes.label: max-value
attributes.description:
Top limit of the range.
You cannot drag your slider beyond this value. By default the value is 10.

attributes.label: min-value
attributes.description:
Bottom limit of the range.
You cannot drag your slider below this value. By default the value is 0.

attributes.label: step
attributes.description:
Increment/decrement step of the slider.
You can change the step setting a different number to this property. Defaults to 1.

attributes.label: value
attributes.description: Initial value.

attributes.label: description
attributes.description: Description of the widget to be displayed

attributes.label: error
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to put the widget in "error mode".
When this attribute is given, its text will be shown in the subheader and the widget content won't be displayed.

attributes.label: error-description
attributes.description: Extended error description, only shown when error is present

attributes.label: heading
attributes.description: Header of the widget to be displayed

attributes.label: is-loading
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to put the widget in "loading mode".
When this attribute is true, the widget won't show any data, a spinner will be placed instead.

attributes.label: no-data-body-message
attributes.description: Message shown in body when no data is available

attributes.label: no-data-header-message
attributes.description: Message shown in header when no data is available

attributes.label: responsive
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to decide if the widget should be rerendered on window resize.
Defaults to true.

attributes.label: show-legend
attributes.description:
Boolean flag to control legend visibility.
Defaults: true

attributes.label: checked
attributes.description: Boolean flag to control if the input is checked or not

attributes.label: disabled
attributes.description: Boolean flag to control when the switch is disabled or not

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: Input label

attributes.label: name
attributes.description: The input name

attributes.label: active-tab
attributes.description: Index of the active tab. Defaults to 0

attributes.label: xl
attributes.description: Make the tabs XL

attributes.label: animated
attributes.description:
Whether it should have animated properties or not. Disabling this makes this look
like a histogra widget with time capabilities

attributes.description: Text rendered inside the clear selection button

attributes.label: time-format
attributes.description:
This string will be parsed by d3-time-format (https://github.com/d3/d3-time-format)
and will be used to format the graph's x-axis

tags.label: as-legend
tags.description: Helper class to draw the vertical axis on some widgets.

tags.label: as-loader
tags.description: Helper class to draw the vertical axis on some widgets.

tags.label: as-widget-header
tags.description: Helper class to draw widget headers

attributes.label: error
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to put the widget-header in "error mode".
When this attribute is not empty the subheader will display the given value.

attributes.label: header
attributes.description: Main title

attributes.label: is-empty
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to put the widget-header in "empty mode".
When this attribute is true the subheader will show the text defined by noDataMessage.

attributes.label: is-loading
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to put the widget-header in "loading mode".
When this attribute is true the subheader text will be displayed as usual.

attributes.label: no-data-message
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to select the text displayed in the subheader when the header is in "empty mode".
Defaults to "NO DATA AVAILABLE"

attributes.label: subheader
attributes.description: Secondary title

tags.label: as-widget-selection
tags.description: Helper class to draw widget selections

attributes.label: clear-text
attributes.description: Text for the clear text

attributes.label: selection
attributes.description: The text to be displayed

attributes.label: show-clear
attributes.description: Whether to display the clear button or not

tags.label: as-y-axis
tags.description:
Helper class to draw the vertical axis on some widgets.
WARNING: This component should be placed next to the SVG element.

attributes.label: from
attributes.description: Lower limit of the axis

attributes.label: responsive
attributes.description:
Use this attribute to decide if the widget should be rerendered on window resize
Defaults to true

attributes.label: to
attributes.description: Upper limit of the axis
